message:
"Newsprint in Sundry Gray"

Inked spreads, weave a tale of fight,
Threads of power, red as the night.
Republicans, Democrats, draw lines too tight.

Majority, Minority, who wields the right?
Ukraine, Russia, clash in light,
Inked spreads, weave a tale of fight.

In Washington, bills lose sight,
Stagnant scarlet, blue kite.
Republicans, Democrats, draw lines too tight.

Caught in print, vivid black and white,
Struggle for truth, fraught with might,
Inked spreads, weave a tale of fight.

Domestic rivalry obscures global plight,
Echoing conflict, despite their unite,
Republicans, Democrats, draw lines too tight.

Read between lines, seek the insight,
Inked spreads, weave a tale of fight,
Republicans, Democrats, draw lines too tight.
prompt: What happened in the Russia-Ukraine war this week? Catch up with the must-read news and analysis Every week we wrap up essential coverage of the war in Ukraine, from news and features to analysis, opinion and more. Republicans block military funding bill for Ukraine Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy (C), with US Senate minority leader Mitch McConnell (L) and Senate majority leader Chuck Schumer (R). Photograph: Mark Schiefelbein/AP The US Senate blocked a supplemental funding bill
